title: Erroneous resteasy "Attempting a blocking read on io thread"
body:
### Describe the bug

If resource endpoint has been wrongly mapped, we get an erroneous exception, at the very least not an easily inderstandable one.

### Expected behavior

The exception should cleary state the issue

### Actual behavior

The exception says the code is blocking, which is wrong, even though the code is indeed wrong...

### How to Reproduce?

Define an endpoint as follow :

```java
@GET
public Uni<String> acmeUniversity(String iAmNotMapped) {
    return Uni.createFrom().item("Acme looniversity");
}
```

If you trigger the endpoint you wil get a :

